User Guide: Use to separate real identifier from technical identifier (for instance pk in data source with no medical meaning)
Indicate which identifier should be display to users. Each patient should have one and only one master identifier.
ETL Conventions: *true* if this identifier is the master

User Guide: Code of the healthcare center, see *hospital_instance* for more informations
ETL Conventions: Names accross all instance_id fields in other tables should match

User Guide: Indicate source software for this record.
Identifier of the pipeline integration run, used to differentiate each batch of integrated data.
ETL Conventions:
Defined at the start of the pipeline as `datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d%H%M%S")`.
For example a batch integrated on 15/09/2025 at 00:00:00 has `upload_id = 20250915000000`.

User Guide: Date and time of the recordâ€™s last update.
